      void testAuthFilterTest() 
      void testBadVersionFormatRequestIsAllowed()
      Test that if the either the min client version or the reported version is incorrectly formatted, the request is allowed.
      void testClientWithLowVersion()
      Test that if the client reports a version lower than the minApiVersion, the request is rejected.
      void testClientWithValidVersion()
      Test that if the client reports a valid version, the request is allowed.
      void testDefaultVersionAssumedOnUnreportedVersion()
      Test that if the client version is not reported, the allowUnversionedClients field is used to determine the response.
      void testVipStatus() 
      void testZKReadFailureAllowsAccess()
      Test that if the min client version cannot be determined from ZooKeeper, the request is allowed.
